resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82055</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82055</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>953</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Quiz - Roof Design & Construction</string>
            <string language="es">Cuestionario – Diseño de tejados y construcción</string>
            <string language="ga">Tráth na gCeist – Dearadh & Tógáil Dín</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Quiz - Dach-Design U. Aufbau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu - Conception et Construction de Toit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quiz - Projeto & Construção Do Telhado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quiz - Progettazione & Costruzione Del Tetto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαγωνισμός γνώσεων - σχέδιο & κατασκευή στεγών</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Pupils will; know terms relating to roof construction, understand different types of roof structure and construction, revise material.</string>
            <string language="es">Los alumnos conocerán términos relativos a la construcción de tejados, comprenderán los diferentes tipos de estructuras de tejados y construcción y revisarán el material.</string>
            <string language="ga">Beidh téarmaí maidir le tógáil dín ar eolas ag daltaí, tuigfidh siad cineálacha difriúla struchtúir agus tógáil dín, rachaidh siad siar ar an ábhar.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Construction Studies</string>
            <string language="es">Estudios de construcción</string>
            <string language="ga">Staidéar Foirgníochta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pupillen werden; kennen Sie Bezeichnungen in
bezug auf Dachaufbau, verstehen Sie unterschiedliche Typen des 
Dachstuhls und des Aufbaus, Revision Material.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les pupilles  ; savez les limites concernant
la construction de toit, comprenez les différents types de la 
structure de toit et de construction, matériel d'épreuve de 
révision.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As pupilas ; saiba os termos que 
relacionam-se à construção do telhado, compreenda tipos diferentes 
de estrutura de telhado e de construção, material da revisão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le pupille; conosca i termini concernente la
costruzione del tetto, capisca i tipi differenti di struttura di tetto
e di costruzioni, materiale della revisione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι μαθητές  ξέρτε τους όρους σχετικά με την 
κατασκευή στεγών, καταλάβετε τους διαφορετικούς τύπους δομών 
στεγών και η κατασκευή, αναθεωρεί το υλικό.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufbau-Studien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Études de Construction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estudos Da Construção</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi Della Costruzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μελέτες κατασκευής</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>953</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>

VERSION:3.0
N:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
FN:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
ORG:National Centre for Technology in Education (NCTE)
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>learner</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <intendedEndUserRole>

            <value>teacher</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <context>

          </context>
          <language>en</language>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">16-18</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>assessment</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

VERSION:3.0

END:VCARD</entity>

            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:Scoilnet;
FN:Scoilnet
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>

              <id>788</id>
